mapper.insert: insert into com_qna(mem_no, com_qna_subject, com_qna_content, com_qna_count) values(#{mem_no},#{com_qna_subject},#{com_qna_content},#{com_qna_count})
mapper.update: update com_qna set mem_no=#{mem_no}, com_qna_subject=#{com_qna_subject}, com_qna_content=#{com_qna_content}, com_qna_count=#{com_qna_count} where com_qna_no=#{com_qna_no}
mapper.select: select * from com_qna where com_qna_no>0 order by com_qna_no desc, com_qna_regdate desc
